= Introduction =
The code includes a number of test application. On that MS Surface, there are two applications which utilize non-anonymous user interaction, and on Android there is an example of how to implement a custom user authentication mechanism. How to install and run the three applications are described here.

= MS Surface =
There are two example application available for the MS Surface, "Warm-up" and "Restaurant". They have been used during conduction of a user evaluation as part of the thesis writing.

== Warm-up ==
It uses default authentication
